title: Unable to login ,since 2 days ago ...
body: Can't login, i tried to reinstall game ,and didnt help,i try to instal hextech .. didnt' help ... So can anyobody tell me what is going on ?

replies.body: I'd like to help but need just a little more info.  What error message are you getting exactly when trying to login?  Are you connected to the EUNE region?

Yes, i am connected to EUNE ..
"An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this Issue persist contact  support at support.riotgames.com "

Even i Reinstall game twice ,didnt' help .. i instal that hextech repair ,didnt help too :) 
sorry for bad English ,i hope so u can help me :) thank you

http://imgur.com/a/k0YPY screenshoot :)
Yep its been 7 days for me! Need help please!
Same. It happened to me today.
